cause.description:
Our Goal...Our Purpose...Our Mission: Elect John Edwards for President in 2008! The time has come for America to have a faith in their leadership...John Edwards will restore America's respect for the Presidency!
PLEASE NOTE THAT DONATIONS MADE THROUGH THIS PAGE WILL BE DONATED TO THE ONE CAMPAIGN AND NOT TO SENATOR EDWARDS.
1. Support the Troops - End the War!
2. Restoring America's Moral Leadership Around the World!
3. Guaranteeing Healthcare for All Americans!
4. Eliminating Poverty in America and Abroad!
5. Finding Alternative/Renewable Sources of Energy!
6. Affordable College for Every Child!
7. Strengthening America's Middle Class!
8. WINNING THE WHITE HOUSE FOR DEMOCRATS!
cause.mission: Elect John Edwards to the Presidency!
cause.name: John Edwards for President
